title: pAmaruni brOva tAmasamA
sahitya:
pAmaruni brOva tAmasamA vinumA umA madagamA


anupallavi

  kAmitArtha phaladAyaki nIvani sadA kOritini ekAmrEshvaruni  rANi kalyANi
natajana pAlini gAnavinOdini shubhankari parAtpari bhakta vashankari
(ciTTasvara sAhitya)
pAvani nI dayagAka nAku vErE vardani sArasAkshi nI pAda padmamula 
sAri sAri nE karuNAkariyani mrokkiti brOvavammA dayatOnu


caraNam    tallI brOva bhAramA nata kalpavalli nI dAsuDugadA parIksha jEyakavE 
kAmAkshi nIdu kaTAksha vIkshaNAmruta prOkshaNatO kavi sadAshivuni 
bhava harinchuTaku manchi samayamidi shiva nAyaki varadAyaki anishamu
pADinA ninu vEDinA rAvavA nEDu kOrina vEDukala dIrcavA
bhavAni vEgamE brOvu sarOja nayani pinAkadharuni manas-sadani
